thread.title: Peak fall colors in Finger Lakes, Hudson Valley this weekend (Oct. 24-25)
thread.title_full: Peak fall colors in Finger Lakes, Hudson Valley this weekend (Oct. 24-25) | syracuse.com

author: Glenn Coin | gcoin@syracuse.com
title: Peak fall colors in Finger Lakes, Hudson Valley this weekend (Oct. 24-25)
text:
Albany, N.Y. -- Time is running out for leaf peepers who want to catch peak fall colors in New York.
Peak colors should appear in the Finger Lakes and Hudson Valley this weekend. New York State Department of Economic Development
Much of Upstate New York is already past peak, with peak colors on tap this weekend for the Finger Lakes and Hudson Valley, according to the state Economic Development Department, which tracks leaf changes through a statewide network of leaf watchers.
"Bright and beautiful peak fall colors continue to appear across New York State and will dominate the Hudson Valley this weekend," the department said. "Also look for peak and near peak color this weekend in the Finger Lakes, Greater Niagara, Long Island and Thousand Islands-Seaway regions."
Here's a rundown of each region and what to expect this weekend.
Adirondacks : Past peak.
Capital District : Past peak.
Catskills : Past peak.
Mohawk Valley/Central New York : Past peak.
Finger Lakes : Peak
Niagara Region : Peak
Thousand Islands : Past peak
Hudson Valley : Peak
Long Island : Midpoint
